transcript:
Customer: Hello



Hello
Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hanji
Customer: Hanji Piyush ji good morning sir.
Executive: Boliyo mam kaun bol rahe hain.
Customer: Pallavi baat kar rahi hu sir IndiaMART se.
Executive: Hanji mam boliye.
Executive: Ji kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Bas theek hai mam.
Executive: Okay sir kal mujhe bataya Kaushesh ne aapki shayad tabiyat nahi sahi thi.
Customer: Hmm hmm mam abhi na main hmm ji ji ji.
Customer: To usi ke liye na matlab decision hai na jo iska wo phir month end pe rakh liya hai humne.
Executive: To dekhiye baat wahi hai ki abhi prices jo bhi mere side se best ho rahe hain sir wo main kara ke de rahi hu aapka one month se extra bhi karwa ke de rahi hu sir matlab 24 mahine ki services ka 25 mahine bhi ho raha hai.
Customer: Mam bas ab main aapko ye ensure karta hu ki month end tak isko kar lenge.
Executive: Sir Piyush ji isme aap meri bhi baat maniye sir dekhiye hum log bhi effort dete hain to thode dino ki wajah se sir dekhiye main baat ye bhi hai aapne November mein hi renew karaya tha last time bhi hai na sir request hi kar sakte hain sir baki to dekhiye payment ultimately aap hi ko karna hai lekin baat itni si hai sir ki visibility bhi impact hoti hai kahin na kahin to yahi
Customer: Chalo wo to mam aise to aise to bahut kuch ho sakta hai.
Executive: Aur main ek cheez aur bhi bata rahi hu sir ek cheez aur bhi bata rahi hu aapki jo services main karwa ke de rahi hu wo aapki phir ek mahina extra hi chalega matlab January mein service aapki khatam hogi do saal plus ek mahina.
Executive: To sir dekhiye matlab effort hai aisa nahi hai ki hum log bhi effort nahi de rahe hain abhi kahan pe dikkat aa rahi hai sir kahan pe problem aa rahi hai abhi.
Customer: Mam abhi is taraf dhyan nahi lag raha hai aur thode se kamon mein busy ho rakhe hain.
Executive: Sir services use ho rahi hai sab kuch theek hai abhi aap khud bataiye sir matlab ki jitna hum log bhi kam kar sakte the wo hum log ne kiya hai sir services.
Customer: Ji mam maine ye to nahi bola na ki aap log kam nahi.
Executive: Baat wo nahi hai sir nahi nahi nahi baat wo nahi hai matlab agar aap aise pressure karke nahi nahi mam mere hisab se aapke hisab se time ho chuka hai mere hisab se time pada hai to isliye matlab koi itna hard and fast nahi hai mere liye.
Customer: To maine already bata diya.
Executive: Ek baat bataiye Koyal ji ek baat bataiye mere ko sir aapko aisa lag raha hai hum pressure de rahe hain sir maine aapko aapne jis time pe bola maine us time pe aapko connect kiya hai.
Customer: Main abhi bhi to abhi phir main aapko bol raha hu na ki main month end tak decision lunga.
Executive: Sir abhi services mein itna time bacha nahi hai na aap ye bhi to dekhiye na sir matlab aap agar ache tarike se bol rahe hain sir karne ka to sir dekhiye company ke bhi kuch rules and regulation hote hain na hum log ko wo bhi follow karna padta hai aap itni better visibility aap ek cheez samajhiyega sir chaliye maine man liya ki aap badhe hue price pe kar doge sir visibility itni bana ke rakh rakhi hai wo aapki impact ho rahi hai wo wapas se banne mein bhi to time lagega na.
Executive: Credit card se hi aapne last time kiya tha sir wahi usi mode se.
Customer: Aise hi hota hai aap na actually sirf you are looking on to on yours chaliye mam koi baat nahi jo bhi impact ho raha hai wo parameter ha ji.
Customer: Chalo ab mam jo hona hai usko kya kar sakte hain.
Executive: Sir do din ka aapne duration bola tha ki do din mein final kar lenge abhi aapka statement bilkul hi change ho gaya hai sir matlab thoda to words pe sir hona chahiye.
Customer: Mam theek hai hum hum words pe nahi hai maine lena hi nahi hai chod dijiye khatam kar dijiye.
Executive: Decision aapka hai lekin
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to postpone decision to month-end.

- Executive highlights visibility impact of delay.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the benefits of renewing.

- Customer refused to renew the subscription.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- subscription, renewal, visibility, payment
